sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
benefits someone
, ali kadar nekdo
benefits from something
, tistemu človeku nekaj izboljša življenje.

seg.quote: ...a medical service which will benefit rich and poor.
The firm benefited from his ingenuity.

sense.def:
The benefits of something
so prednosti, ki jih tisto prinese ljudem.

Benefit
je denar, ki ga vlada daje revnim, bolnim ali brezposelnim ljudem.

seg.quote: You are entitled to child benefit.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
to someone's benefit
ali
of benefit to someone
, tistemu pomaga izboljšati življenje.

seg.quote: This will be of benefit to the country as a whole.

sense.def:
To have the benefit of something
pomeni imeti zaradi tistega prednost.

seg.quote: I had the benefit of a good education.

sense.def:
To do something for the benefit of someone
pomeni, da tisto storimo posebej za nekega človeka.

seg.quote: He smiled for the benefit of the reporters.

sense.def:
To give someone the benefit of the doubt
pomeni vzeti tisto, kar nekdo reče, za resnico, ker mu ne moremo dokazati, da ni res.
